open /yui2/latest_build/examples/dragdrop/dd-region_clean.html
storeElementPositionLeft dd-demo-1 elX
storeElementPositionTop dd-demo-1 elY
storeElementPositionLeft dd-demo-canvas3 containerX
storeElementPositionTop dd-demo-canvas3 containerY

verifyExpression ${containerX} 12345
verifyExpression ${elX} 12345
